Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

Hope you all are fine.My name is David and i am new in this forum.I am working in a super store as a manager and i want to discussed some thing here.Hope have a nice discussion.

Welcome to the forums!

I'd highly recommend that you check out the Drawing Board (link in my sig) if you ever get stuck anywhere in the game. It has tons of useful information, including tutorials and other references that you can use to aid in your spaceflights. Don't be afraid to ask questions in the How To section of the boards as well.

Happy landings!
